supportServer.description: Details about the Support Server - like invite links and Premium roles

id.description: The Discord ID of the support server

invite.description: The Discord invite URL to add members to the support server

patreonRoles.description: A list of roles to give Patreon subscribers in the support server, and the corresponding tiers

supporterRole.description: The role to give members that have purchased a subscription in the support server.

invites.title: Links to invite the bot
invites.description: The Discord OAuth URLs to add the bot to a user's server.

standard.description: The Discord OAuth URL to add the bot to a user's server with a minimal set of permissions.

admin.description: The Discord OAuth URL to add the bot to a user's server with a larger set of permissions.

disablePatreon.description: Whether to disable Patreon-related features like role updates and Patreon API queries.

developmentServers.description: The IDs of servers in which to register development commands

Snowflake.description: A Discord "Snowflake" (<https://discord.com/developers/docs/reference#snowflakes>), represented as a string.
